com.mumfrey.liteloader.api.manager

Interface APIAdapter


  • public interface APIAdapter
    API Adapter provides convenience methods for invoking actions on ALL registered APIs
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends Observer>
      java.util.List<T>      		 getAllObservers(java.lang.Class<T> observerType)
      Get the observers for all registered APIs which implement the specified Observer interface.
      java.util.List<CoreProvider> getCoreProviders()
      Get the CoreProviders for the specified API.
      java.util.List<? extends Observer> getObservers(LiteAPI api)
      Get the observers for the specified API.
      <T extends Observer>
      java.util.List<T>      		 getObservers(LiteAPI api, java.lang.Class<T> observerType)
      Get the observers for the specified API which implement the specified Observer interface.
      <T extends Observer>
      java.util.List<T>      		 getPreInitObservers(java.lang.Class<T> observerType) 
      java.util.List<? extends Observer> getPreInitObservers(LiteAPI api) 
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRequiredDownstreamTransformers()
      Aggregate and return required downstream transformers from all registered APIs
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRequiredTransformers()
      Aggregate and return required transformers from all registered APIs
      void initMixins()
      APIs should register their mixin configs and set up the mixin environment here.
      void registerInterfaces(InterfaceRegistry interfaceManager)
      Register interfaces from all registered APIs with the specified registry

    • Method Detail

      • initMixins

        void initMixins()
        APIs should register their mixin configs and set up the mixin environment here.

      • getRequiredTransformers

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRequiredTransformers()
        Aggregate and return required transformers from all registered APIs

      • getRequiredDownstreamTransformers

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRequiredDownstreamTransformers()
        Aggregate and return required downstream transformers from all registered APIs

      • registerInterfaces

        void registerInterfaces(InterfaceRegistry interfaceManager)
        Register interfaces from all registered APIs with the specified registry

      • getCoreProviders

        java.util.List<CoreProvider> getCoreProviders()
        Get the CoreProviders for the specified API. Consuming classes should call this method instead of calling API::getCoreProviders() directly since getCoreProviders() should only be invoked once and the resulting collection is cached by the API Adapter

      • getObservers

        java.util.List<? extends Observer> getObservers(LiteAPI api)
        Get the observers for the specified API. Consuming classes should call this method instead of calling API::getObservers() directly since getObservers() should only be invoked once and the resulting list is cached by the API Adapter
        Parameters:
        api - API to get observers for

      • getObservers

        <T extends Observer> java.util.List<T> getObservers(LiteAPI api,
                                                    java.lang.Class<T> observerType)
        Get the observers for the specified API which implement the specified Observer interface. Always returns a valid list (even if empty) and doesn't return null.
        Parameters:
        api - API to get observers for
        observerType - type of observer to search for

      • getAllObservers

        <T extends Observer> java.util.List<T> getAllObservers(java.lang.Class<T> observerType)
        Get the observers for all registered APIs which implement the specified Observer interface. Always returns a valid list (even if empty) and doesn't return null. Also includes core providers
        Parameters:
        observerType - type of observer to search for

      • getPreInitObservers

        java.util.List<? extends Observer> getPreInitObservers(LiteAPI api)
        Parameters:
        api -

      • getPreInitObservers

        <T extends Observer> java.util.List<T> getPreInitObservers(java.lang.Class<T> observerType)
        Parameters:
        observerType -
